item.title: Fallen Fruit Causing Dangerous Walkway - NOT FIXED, 12th December
item.description:
I logged the below issue, Report ref: 8533879. It has been masked as resolved/fixed but it HAS NOT been touched at all. It's still all there as slippery and as dangerous as ever. The danger is outside on the public walkway of number 81 Grasmere Road as well as further up the road outside numbers 73 and 71. Again please note this was marked as fixed but it HAS NOT BEEN TOUCHED. A lot of fruit has fallen from this tree and the one a couple of houses up from this one. It is causing a serious trip hazard and needs to be cleaned urgently as people are slipping all the time when walking on the path. It has been like this for a number of weeks now if not longer and the rain has not cleaned it away at all.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 79, Grasmere Road, Barnehurst, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.category: Utility Works and Temporary Traffic Lights

item.title: Leaves left to rot on the park lawns, 12th December
item.description:
There was early leaf fall this year and now the trees are all bare of leaves. The leaves which have fallen have not once been cleared off the lawns and grassed areas anywhere in the park. As a result with the wet weather this autumn they have lain there rotting. This is unsightly and detracts from enjoyment of Kelsey Park, as well as damaging the grass. Please can they be cleared without further delay

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Manor Way, Beckenham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Forest Bikes, 12th December
item.description:
I would like to report that a number of forest bikes are currently obstructing the pathway between Adelphi and Robert Street. This obstruction is preventing safe and accessible passage for pedestrians. I respectfully request that the Council address and resolve this issue at the earliest opportunity. Thank you for your attention to this matter.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1-3, Robert Street, City of Westminster
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lights out on slip road off Erith Road towards Bursted Woods Surgery, 12th December
item.description:
All the lights as you turn the corner off Erith Road as you go towards Bursted Woods surgery are not working. The first lamp post is number 9 and the last one is number 13 but the other lamp posts do not have numbers on them. Please can this be looked into with a matter of urgency as it is very dark.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): FP39, Barnehurst, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
